gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 121, Mavericks 119
gameRecap.excerpt: Cleveland ends the game on a 21-9 run to defeat Dallas, 121-119. For Cleveland, Donovan Mitchell recorded a season-high seven 3PM with 31 points, seven rebounds, and six assists aided by Max Strus hitting the game-winner with 21 points, four rebounds, and four assists and Jarrett Allen with 19 points and nine rebounds. Luka Doncic led the way with 45 points (six 3PM), nine rebounds, and 14 assists while Kyrie Irving tallied 30 points (five 3PM) and six rebounds for Dallas in the losing effort. Cleveland wins and improves to 38-19 on the season, while Dallas moves to 33-25 with the loss.
